Command.label: Currency Command
Command.tooltip: The command that will be responded to.

Style.label: Stylesheet
Style.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the command is used.

MaxVisible.label: Max Visible Uses
MaxVisible.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the command is used.

Enabled.label: Enabled
Enabled.tooltip: Determines if the Overlay picks up new uses of the command.

RainbowMode.label: Use Rainbow Mode
RainbowMode.tooltip: Instead of the Stylesheet it will use Rainbow colors
